tool_description: news about the current state of Russia and Ukraine
name: Ukraine - Russia live news
title: Ukraine - Russia live news

api_list.name: Get Articles From Single Source
api_list.description: Get news about Russia and Ukraine from a specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-russia-live-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/bbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-russia-live-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://ukraine-russia-live-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{source}"

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
